text: Derek McLean (born 21 December 1932) was a professional footballer who played for Middlesbrough and Hartlepool United.the Boro Alphabet - A Century of Middlesbrough Players 1899-1999 Edited by Dave Allan . Compiled by Dave Allan, Harry Glasper,Peter Harris, Mark Hooper, Dave Robson.
